addr: 291 Church Street New York, NEW YORK 10013
title: Speculation in City Government: A Roundtable Discussion
desc:
Alternative Unknowns ?began with a meeting between the exhibition's curators, designers, and folks from the New York City Emergency Management, to discuss potentially beneficial intersections between speculative design and emergency management. These discussions shaped the direction of the exhibition, for which participating designers created products to be used during a hypothetical pandemic that spreads through New York City. Now it is time for the discussion group to reconvene, and for emergency preparedness professionals at New York City Emergency Management to consider and evaluate the role of speculative thinking and what has been produced and proposed.? 
 Participants: Iskra Gencheva, NYC Emergency Management Ben Krakauer, NYC Emergency Management Elliott P. Montgomery Chris Woebken? contributing artists and designers? 
 Held in conjunction with the apexart exhibition? Alternative Unknowns,? an exhibition of potential emergency organized by Elliott P. Montgomery and Chris Woebken.
